title: To the Dark
description: THIS BOOK IS TEMPORARILY UNAVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE DUE TO A PUBLISHER RESTRUCTURING. PLEASE, BEAR WITH ME WHILE I'M SEARCHING FOR A NEW PUBLISHER. THANK YOU!Luciannaâ€™s life is nearly perfect. She has a loyal best friend, the perfect boyfriend and has been distinguished as one of the best among her peer sorcerers. That all changes after she meets James, a handsome warlock. With their relationship progressing, Lucianna discovers that the world of magic has a dark side, but it is too late to stop her world as she knew it from crumbling into pieces.
author: Kat Doughty
